text: so I definitely think in the sense that
for a lot of companies you're running a
developed part of your product that's

that's part of a broader symptom like
the most successful platforms are also
the ones that are used internally and
you really have a strong feedback loop
so I do think in the sense that why it's
so rare to see truly exceptional
developer first companies is that it's

like an easy way to open up custom
Integrations Etc so shipping the org
chart yeah I definitely think that's

terms of like if you don't have product

and really focuses on developers as a
main segment they care about then you
end up with an engineering team that's

fractions of the company and org chart
